p: Serum or plasma samples from patient with suspected DENV infection were collected at Port Vila Central Hospital, Efate, Vanuatu between December 2016 to March 2017. 100 μL of material along with 5 μL of EPC was processed using the EasyScreen Sample Processing Kit, SP001 (Genetic Signatures, Sydney, Australia) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. After bisulphite conversion the samples were extracted on the GS-mini automated nucleic extraction platform using the EasyScreen Sample Processing Kit, SP006 (Genetic Signatures, Sydney, Australia) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
